notes: Requires Node 20.x + Yarn 1.22.22+; recommends local disk (not network/mapped drive).

Plugin system + decoupled core packages (bytepad-core/types/storage/plugins/utils)
Debug overlay (Ctrl+Alt+D), bridge diagnostics (/debug/bridge), storage diagnostics (/debug/storage)
Backup/restore + undo/redo + search/filter
